name: "Exalted Earth"
desc:
Specialized refinement material for "Dialogues of the Desert Sages."

In introductory alchemy studies, mercury is often called "Exalted Earth," for it can even greedily devour gold. As such, it is also used in alchemy to represent metal.

It still possesses the potential for transformation even after being dried and turned to dust.

value.text:
Version 4.5 Event - Alchemical Ascension
Event Rewards - Artisans' Gift

value.name: Dialogues of the Desert Sages
value.desc: A caduceus symbolizing the glory of alchemy, made from special alloys to match its special status. It is exceedingly rigid and heavy, and would probably hurt pretty bad if used as a cudgel.
